main.name: Adnan Sami Shazim
main.description: Working with MERN Stack & React Native
main.bio: Software Engineer specialized in JavaScript, React, Next.js and React Native. With over 2 years of experience in web development & cross-platform mobile app development, I consider myself a valuable asset to any team focused on developing responsive, user-friendly web and mobile applications. I am committed to staying up-to-date with the latest technologies and trends in the industry, and I look forward to continuing to grow and develop further in this industry.

education.school: Institute of Information & Technology (IIT) - University of Dhaka
education.description: Post Graduate Diploma in Information Technology (PGDIT)

education.school: Institute of Education and Research - University of Dhaka

work.title: React Native Developer
work.description: As a software engineer, my responsibilities are; producing fully functional customized application and integration with APIs, working closely with UI/UX team to design and develop application interface, supporting the team in the entire application development lifecycle, designing, developing and integrating cross-platform applications with effective APIs, unit Testing, troubleshooting, debugging and monitoring activities to ensure or improve responsiveness and efficiency on all projects Collaborating with other team members to bring projects and initiatives to fruition, last but not the least, liaising with teams to plan new features with MERN Stack and React Native

work.company: ITPeople Limited (Sister Concern of Spellbound Leo Burnett)
work.title: React Native Developer
work.description: As a junior react native developer, I worked designed the react native app while integrated Restful APIs for interested investors to join Bangladesh-Qatar Roadshow event. I also reduced time to market by 60% with a hassle free UI Design and user experience while collaborating with senior devs.

work.title: React Native Developer
work.description: Core responsibility is to develop native mobile application (Tailgate) using React Native Expo, Firebase, Redux Toolkit, and Tailwind CSS. Also, designing screens from Figma and implementing them with React Navigation. Another responsibility is to manage and attend daily SCRUM with team members and weekly meetings with the senior developer to keep everything in check.

work.title: React.js Developer | Team Lead
work.description: Worked as an in-house React.js Developer and Team Leader of Web & Programming Team. My responsibility here as a team leader is to support team members on a 24/7 basis and instruct them the fundamentals of 'Front-end Web Development with React.js'

skills.name: UI (Bootstrap, Material UI, Tailwind CSS, AntDesign)

testimonials.text: Shazim is an excellent Developer. We hired him for a project and he did his work with perfection. He also trained our team some new concepts that brought us more success. Wishing him luck!!
